com.phunware.locationmessaging.messages

Interface MessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleMessageListener

    public interface MessageListener
    Used for receiving notifications from the MessageManager when messages are added, updated, or removed from the manager. These methods are called if the MessageListener has been added to the MessageManager via the MessageManager.addMessageListener(MessageListener) method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessageAdded(Long messageId)
      Called when a new Message is added to the MessageManager.
      void onMessageRemoved(Long messageId)
      Called when a Message is deleted from the MessageManager.
      void onMessageUpdated(Long messageId)
      Called when a Message is updated in the MessageManager.

    • Method Detail

      • onMessageAdded

        void onMessageAdded(Long messageId)
        Called when a new Message is added to the MessageManager.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The database id of the message that was added.

      • onMessageUpdated

        void onMessageUpdated(Long messageId)
        Called when a Message is updated in the MessageManager.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The database id of the message that was updated.

      • onMessageRemoved

        void onMessageRemoved(Long messageId)
        Called when a Message is deleted from the MessageManager.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The database id of the message that was deleted.
